html.p: An addin for Oracle's java IDE, JDeveloper which supports the Apache Jakarta Ant tool is available from this site.

img.alt: Image of the Buildfile Wizard, Compile Options Page. Click to see a larger version.

html.p: The Ant Addin for JDeveloper is distributed under the Mozilla Public License 1.1. You must read the license and agree to the terms before using or redistributing this software.

Ant is a tool for building code, similar to the popular tool make. Ant makes use of the highly extensible XML format for it's build files and is designed to be as cross platform as possible. Many open source Java applications use Ant as their build tool.
More information on Ant is available at http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/index.html.

JDeveloper is Oracle Corporation's Java and XML integrated development environment. The IDE is highly extensible through its addin framework. The source code of the Ant addin can be used for many examples of using the JDevleoper addin framework.
More information on JDeveloper is available at http://otn.oracle.com/products/jdev.
